TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRelatedEnd

summary.span: 定义关系的端。

span.span: Defines the end of a relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义表示关联中一端的对象的要求。 defines the requirements for an object that represents an end in an association. 此接口由实现类。This interface is implemented by the class. 是类的基类和类。 is the base class for the and classes. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，这由生成[实体数据模型向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下面的示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体并显示关系名称、 源角色名称和每个相关端的目标角色名称。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将对象添加到相关端。The method adds an object to the related end. 相关端必须为 。The related end must be an . 当源对象实现中跟踪和，还跟踪所添加的对象。When the source object implements and is being tracked in the , the object being added is also tracked. 类显式实现 方法。The class explicitly implements the method. 类使用此实现。The class uses this implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 如果相关的端是并引用的属性不是`null`，此方法将引发异常。If the related end is an and the property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.

span.span: The object being attached.
entity must implement .

summary.span: 定义两个附加对象之间的关系。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于定义附加到同一 实例的两个对象之间的关系。The method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same instance. 类显式实现 方法。The class explicitly implements the method. 类使用此实现定义附加的源对象和附加到集合的对象之间的关系。The class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加和分离对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).

summary.span: 将一个或多个相关对象加载到此相关端中。

span.span: Loads the related object or objects into this related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Load` 调用以从导航属性公开的相关端中显式加载相关的对象。`Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

summary.span: 使用默认合并选项将一个或多个相关对象加载到此相关端中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现 的 方法。The class implements the method of . 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 调用以从导航属性公开的相关端中显式加载相关的对象。 is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). 方法加载相关的对象从数据源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现 方法。The class implements the method. 和 类都重写此实现。Both the and classes override this implementation. `Load` 调用以从导航属性公开的相关端中显式加载相关的对象。`Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). 方法加载相关的对象从数据源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`.

summary.span: 获取此相关端所参与的关系的名称。

span.span: The name of the relationship in which this is participating.

value.span: 关系名称不由命名空间限定。

span.span: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，这由生成[实体数据模型向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下面的示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体并显示关系名称、 源角色名称和目标角色命名为每个相关端。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. summary.span: 获取关系的源端的角色名称。

value.span: 关系源端处的角色名称。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现属性。The class implements the property. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 角色名称由指定`Role`属性的`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现 属性。The class implements the property. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 角色名称由指定`Role`属性的`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
